::Zardus/DeathStorm/Shredder/Mosquitor::

"Yes. He ussually isn't," Zardus says in reply to Nemesis' 
transmission. He looks at Wolfgang.

"Let's return to base. We can talk further there..." He says as he 
walk off in the direction of the alliance base.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DeathStorm walks out of his ship. He thinks for a moment and then 
flies off toward the maximal base.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Shredder jumps in front of BrightBlade, firing at her.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mosquitor turns around from his position in front of the scanners.

"Our troops have engaged the enemy, Leadership," He says to Hell 
Beast, "Shall we go join them?"
